selected_file: 🟢 RRID798_Manual Testers 5-8 y_Roche Molecular Systems - India
original_content:
DBA (not necessarily a DBA, but someone with below skills):
-	Expertise in Oracle schema, temporary tables, views, stored procedures, functions, constrains and sequences
-	Expertise in PostgreSQL schema, temporary tables, views, stored procedures, functions, constrains and sequences
-	Experience in migrating Oracle database to PostgreSQL
-	Understand authentication mechanism between Oracle and PostgreSQL and its impact on application
-	Understand and assess Oracle to PostgreSQL migration impact on application
-	Experience in configuring highly available PostgreSQL database on AWS Cloud and setting up monitoring and performance tuning for PostgreSQL
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is responsible for managing and optimizing the organization's critical database infrastructure, with a focus on seamless migration and integration between Oracle and PostgreSQL platforms. As a technical expert, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring the reliability, scalability, and performance of our mission-critical applications. Your deep understanding of database architecture, migration strategies, and cloud-based deployment will be instrumental in driving the organization's digital transformation initiatives.

Key Responsibilities:
- Design, implement, and maintain robust Oracle and PostgreSQL database schemas, including tables, views, stored procedures, functions, constraints, and sequences
- Spearhead the migration of Oracle databases to the PostgreSQL platform, ensuring a smooth transition with minimal disruption to application functionality
- Analyze and address the impact of authentication mechanisms and other technical considerations on the application during the migration process
- Configure and manage highly available PostgreSQL database deployments on the AWS Cloud, setting up comprehensive monitoring and performance tuning solutions
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve database-related issues, ensuring optimal application performance and availability
- Develop and document database best practices, standards, and procedures to enhance the overall database management lifecycle
- Continuously explore and implement innovative database technologies and strategies to drive organizational efficiency and competitiveness

Required Skills:
- Extensive expertise in Oracle and PostgreSQL database administration, including schema design, optimization, and troubleshooting
- Strong understanding of database concepts, such as indexing, partitioning, locking, and transaction management
- Proficiency in writing complex SQL queries, stored procedures, and functions to automate and optimize database operations
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills to identify and resolve complex database-related issues
- Effective communication and collaboration skills to work closely with development, operations, and business teams

Preferred Skills:
- Experience in database migration and integration, particularly in transitioning from Oracle to PostgreSQL
- Familiarity with cloud-based database deployment and management, preferably on the AWS platform
- Knowledge of database monitoring and performance tuning techniques to ensure optimal system performance
- Understanding of authentication mechanisms and their impact on application integration

Required Experience:
- Minimum 5 years of experience in database administration, with a focus on Oracle and PostgreSQL
- Proven track record of successfully managing and optimizing mission-critical database systems
- Experience in leading database migration projects, including planning, execution, and post-migration support

Preferred Experience:
- Experience in configuring and managing highly available database deployments on cloud platforms, such as AWS
- Familiarity with database performance tuning and optimization techniques, including query optimization and index management
- Exposure to DevOps practices and tools for streamlining database management and deployment

Tools & Technologies:
- Oracle Database
- PostgreSQL
- SQL
- PL/SQL
- AWS Cloud (RDS, EC2, CloudWatch)
- Database monitoring and performance tuning tools (e.g., pgAdmin, pgBadger, pg_stat_statements)

Work Environment & Expectations:
This role requires a collaborative and proactive approach, as you will be working closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, IT operations, and business stakeholders. You will be expected to stay up-to-date with the latest database technologies and best practices, continuously improving your skills and knowledge to drive innovation and efficiency within the organization. A strong commitment to delivering high-quality, reliable, and secure database solutions is essential for success in this role.

Role Overview:
As a database specialist, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring the seamless integration and optimization of our organization's critical data infrastructure. With a deep understanding of both Oracle and PostgreSQL database platforms, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining robust database solutions that drive the success of our mission-critical applications. Your expertise in database migration, cloud-based deployment, and performance tuning will be instrumental in supporting the organization's digital transformation initiatives.

Key Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain efficient Oracle and PostgreSQL database schemas, including tables, views, stored procedures, functions, constraints, and sequences
- Spearhead the migration of Oracle databases to the PostgreSQL platform, ensuring a smooth transition with minimal disruption to application functionality
- Analyze and address the impact of authentication mechanisms and other technical considerations on the application during the migration process
- Configure and manage highly available PostgreSQL database deployments on the AWS Cloud, setting up comprehensive monitoring and performance tuning solutions
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve database-related issues, ensuring optimal application performance and availability
- Establish and enforce database best practices, standards, and procedures to enhance the overall database management lifecycle
- Continuously explore and implement innovative database technologies and strategies to drive organizational efficiency and competitiveness

Required Skills:
- Extensive expertise in Oracle and PostgreSQL database administration, including schema design, optimization, and troubleshooting
- Proficiency in writing complex SQL queries, stored procedures, and functions to automate and optimize database operations
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and resolve complex database-related issues
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with development, operations, and business teams

Preferred Skills:
- Experience in database migration and integration, particularly in transitioning from Oracle to PostgreSQL
- Familiarity with cloud-based database deployment and management, preferably on the AWS platform
- Understanding of authentication mechanisms and their impact on application integration
- Knowledge of database monitoring and performance tuning techniques to ensure optimal system performance

Required Experience:
- Minimum 5 years of experience in database administration, with a focus on Oracle and PostgreSQL
- Proven track record of successfully managing and optimizing mission-critical database systems
- Experience in leading database migration projects, including planning, execution, and post-migration support

Preferred Experience:
- Experience in configuring and managing highly available database deployments on cloud platforms, such as AWS
- Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools for streamlining database management and deployment
- Exposure to database performance tuning and optimization techniques, including query optimization and index management

Tools & Technologies:
- Oracle Database
- PostgreSQL
- SQL
- PL/SQL
- AWS Cloud (RDS, EC2, CloudWatch)
- Database monitoring and performance tuning tools (e.g., pgAdmin, pgBadger, pg_stat_statements)

Work Environment & Expectations:
This role requires a proactive and collaborative approach, as you will be working closely with cross-functional teams to ensure the reliability, scalability, and performance of our mission-critical applications. You will be expected to stay up-to-date with the latest database technologies and best practices, continuously improving your skills and knowledge to drive innovation and efficiency within the organization. A strong commitment to delivering high-quality, secure, and reliable database solutions is essential for success in this role.

Role Overview:
As a database migration and integration specialist, you will be responsible for seamlessly transitioning the organization's critical data infrastructure from Oracle to the PostgreSQL platform. Your deep expertise in both database systems, coupled with your understanding of cloud-based deployment and performance optimization, will be instrumental in driving the organization's digital transformation initiatives. In this pivotal role, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure the reliability, scalability, and performance of our mission-critical applications, while continuously exploring and implementing innovative database strategies to enhance organizational efficiency and competitiveness.

Key Responsibilities:
- Design and implement robust Oracle and PostgreSQL database schemas, including tables, views, stored procedures, functions, constraints, and sequences
- Lead the migration of Oracle databases to the PostgreSQL platform, ensuring a smooth transition with minimal disruption to application functionality
- Analyze and address the impact of authentication mechanisms and other technical considerations on the application during the migration process
- Configure and manage highly available PostgreSQL database deployments on the AWS Cloud, setting up comprehensive monitoring and performance tuning solutions
- Collaborate with development, operations, and business teams to identify and resolve database-related issues, ensuring optimal application performance and availability
- Develop and document database best practices, standards, and procedures to enhance the overall database management lifecycle
- Stay at the forefront of database technologies and strategies, continuously exploring and implementing innovative solutions to drive organizational efficiency

Required Skills:
- Extensive expertise in both Oracle and PostgreSQL database administration, including schema design, optimization, and troubleshooting
- Proficiency in writing complex SQL queries, stored procedures, and functions to automate and optimize database operations
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and resolve complex database-related issues
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams

Preferred Skills:
- In-depth understanding of database migration and integration, particularly in transitioning from Oracle to PostgreSQL
- Familiarity with cloud-based database deployment and management, preferably on the AWS platform
- Knowledge of authentication mechanisms and their impact on application integration
- Expertise in database monitoring and performance tuning techniques to ensure optimal system performance

Required Experience:
- Minimum 5 years of experience in database administration, with a focus on both Oracle and PostgreSQL
- Proven track record of successfully managing and optimizing mission-critical database systems
- Experience in leading database migration projects, including planning, execution, and post-migration support

Preferred Experience:
- Experience in configuring and managing highly available database deployments on cloud platforms, such as AWS
- Familiarity with DevOps practices and tools for streamlining database management and deployment
- Exposure to database performance tuning and optimization techniques, including query optimization and index management

Tools & Technologies:
- Oracle Database
- PostgreSQL
- SQL
- PL/SQL
- AWS Cloud (RDS, EC2, CloudWatch)
- Database monitoring and performance tuning tools (e.g., pgAdmin, pgBadger, pg_stat_statements)

Work Environment & Expectations:
This role requires a proactive, collaborative, and innovative approach, as you will be working closely with cross-functional teams to ensure the seamless integration and optimization of our mission-critical data infrastructure. You will be expected to stay at the forefront of database technologies and best practices, continuously improving your skills and knowledge to drive organizational efficiency and competitiveness. A strong commitment to delivering high-quality, secure, and reliable database solutions is essential for success in this role.
